definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
lit. the fire burns one's eyebrows (idiom); fig. desperate situation/extreme emergency
careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task
pinyin: mei2 mao5 hu2 zi5 yi1 ba3 zhua1

sentences.english: I asked the strange boy, raising my eyebrows in curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 我好奇地扬起眉毛问这个奇怪的年轻人。

sentences.english: I'd like to shorten my bangs down to touch my eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 我想把刘海剪到眉毛的位置。

sentences.english: Please lower your brows and draw them together.
sentences.chinese: 请放低你的眉毛，将他们拧在一起。

sentences.english: And smoothing an eyebrow with a dampened little finger used by males to denote effeminacy in other males.
sentences.chinese: 用潮湿的小指梳理眉毛，暗讽某男士有女人气。

sentences.english: Snowflakes clung to his eyebrows and to the fur trim of his jacket and cap.
sentences.chinese: 眉毛上挂着雪花，茄克的毛边和帽子上都是雪。

sentences.english: Eyebrows glued up into tiny peaks.
sentences.chinese: 给眉毛粘出小小的眉峰。

sentences.english: She took a razor and shaved between my eyebrows and even shaped them.
sentences.chinese: 她还拿剃刀剃掉我眉毛的中间，甚至修出眉形。

sentences.english: The only injury I saw was a bloody gash on its brow.
sentences.chinese: 我只看见它的眉毛处有一个深深的流着血的伤口。

sentences.english: If you have naturally thick eyebrows just tweeze a little and thank the lord you have such lucky genes!
sentences.chinese: 如果你的眉毛很浓，就可以用镊子拔掉一些。

sentences.english: Pierced ears, nose, navel, eye brows.
sentences.chinese: 穿洞的耳朵，鼻子，肚脐，眉毛。

sentences.english: No bangs, big eyes, thick eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 没刘海，眼睛较大，眉毛浓。

sentences.english: He cocked an eyebrow for me to explain.
sentences.chinese: 他向我竖起眉毛要求解释。

sentences.english: The white stuff on the baby's eyebrows is called vernix.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿眉毛上那种白色的东西叫胎儿皮脂。

sentences.english: Maybe we know we are close to the end and we really push ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 也许是因为火烧眉毛了就开始努力吧。

sentences.english: Otherwise, in the course of time will lead to gray blue eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 否则久而久之都会导致眉毛发灰变蓝。

definition: sloping eyebrows, formed like character for "eight"
outer tip of the eyebrow/(facial) expression/(Tw) knack/trick of the trade
